leaflet.candidateName: Chris Were, Pippa Bartolotti, Owen Clarke, Alan Williams

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Help protect the environment by investing in the Green economy (creating 50,000 new Welsh jobs)
Defend our public services (e.g healthcare, education, transport)
Support our local businesses, which keep money in the local economy
Localise the food industry. Support our small and medium sized Welsh farms

mentions.candidate: The Green Party regional list candidates are: Chris Were, Pippa Bartolotti, Owen Clarke and Alan Williams.
mentions.tacticalSituation: In the Assembly elections, you have two votes. The Green Party has a real chance of getting an AM elected on the second vote. You can vote for any of the other parties' candidates for the constituency, and vote for the Green Party for the regional list.

issues.economy: Investing in the Green economy (creating 50,000 new Welsh jobs).
issues.education: Defend our public services (e.g healthcare, education, transport).
issues.environment: Help protect the environment by investing in the Green economy.
issues.health: Defend our public services (e.g healthcare, education, transport).

images.caption: Vote Green Party for the Welsh Assembly on May 5th

leaflet.additionalNotes: Published and promoted by Amy Waren on behalf of Wales Green Party at 41b Wood Street, Maesteg, NP251FS SFT
